text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: We've got a lot of big players in today's “Hanshin Grand Prize” Shiba's 3000m turf lineupー

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Today's attention is on the “Annual Representative Horse Girl” confrontation between Narita Brian and Mayano Top Gun!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: An unusually large number of fans have gathered at the Hanshin racetrack to see what kind of ending the match will bring!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The atmosphere is a little different from Brian's usual races so far…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It's because so far, we've been only bystanders to be overwhelmed by Brian's running.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But… Now it's different, right.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Brian-san, please run with everything you got. We will support you with all our might.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Yeah, I'm counting on you.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Now that's decided let's go to the stands! Because I secured the furthest place in!
Well then, let's head to the underground road, too. I'll send you off.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I got it. …I will be going.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Do your best, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Have a safe run.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh! She is here!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It seems that there is no problem with your spirit. You still have the feeling of wanting to keep running as usual.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's all because I wanted to try the results of running with Big-sister and Amazon that I couldn't sleep.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Mayano Top Gunー there is no arguing her ability, but the opponent you should be fighting right now is, you yourself.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Go and win, against the timer of yourself…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, watch me.
Brian, you've surprised everyone many times. Records of large margins, overwhelming victory, victory's on big stagesー
Brian, you've surprised everyone many times. Records of large margins, overwhelming victory, victory's on big stagesー
And I'm sure there will be a lot of recognition from now on. Your feelings have not changed since the time we met.
And I'm sure there will be a lot of recognition from now on. Your feelings have not changed since the time we met.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Hmph, I'll do my best…!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: There's a nice number of fans, isn't there. They seem to be excited about the “Annual Representative Horse Girl” showdown!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Maya is as excited as everyone else! I can run with Brian-san!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I see.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: …If Maya's thinking isn't wrong, Brian can't do that run anymore before you got hurt.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: But, even so, my burning feelings have not disappeared! Brian-san's feelings are not at all different from those days!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: That's why, Maya will run with all her might…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph… It's a little different from that it hasn't changed.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I could no longer run the race I had been doing naturally, and rather than nourish my thirsty heart, the victory was far gone.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: But, the father away from victory, the more the thirst grows. Everytime I shake the victory, I'm inspired.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: The craving for running is so far my No. 1 strength…!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Yeah! I won't lose, Brian-san!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Very well, come at me…!
